cab.content: Dolonel Jone^^4 9/a CAB In/(This Document isoperrv 01OPERATIONS. S E. C R E T.From :- General Delme Radcliff.e, Italy,To :- C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in at 11.40 p.m, 10,1.18, Received at 4 aem, 11.1,18,10109.Situation evening. 10th January,3rd Army. During day of January 9th slow but systematic shelling of Musile Castaldia Cavazuccherina and Cortellazza by hostile medium calibre artillery.4th Army. Slight enemy artillery activity along the whole front.1st Army. During -day of January 9th enemy artillery activity on fronts of 20th and 22nd Corps, Medium and heavy shells in Val Frenzelo Valincaua Caprilo Rivalta, 3rd Corps. During day of January 9th, enemy shelled Italian positions from Stelnio to M, Scorlu accompanied by bursts of machine gun fire, rifle and barrage fire.
